      • deepFindClosestItem

        public MapItem deepFindClosestItem(GeoPoint location,
                                   double threshold,
                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> metadata)
        Description copied from interface: DeepMapItemQuery
        Finds the closest MapItem to the specified point, that falls within the specified threshold.
        Specified by:
        deepFindClosestItem in interface DeepMapItemQuery
        Parameters:
        location - The location
        threshold - The search threshold, in meters. Only items that are within this distance from the point are considered. If no threshold is desired, the value 0.0d should be specified.
        metadata - Extra query metadata
        Returns:
        Closest map item or null if none found

      • deepHitTest

        public java.util.SortedSet<MapItem> deepHitTest(MapView mapView,
                                                HitTestQueryParameters params,
                                                java.util.Map<Layer2,java.util.Collection<HitTestControl>> controls)
        Description copied from interface: DeepHitTestControlQuery
        Perform a hit test with access to hit test controls NOTE: This is called on the GL thread with a lock on the map controls Do NOT call MapRenderer3#visitControl(Layer2, Visitor, Class) or any related method here or else the app will deadlock. This is why the controls are provided upfront.
        Specified by:
        deepHitTest in interface DeepHitTestControlQuery
        Parameters:
        mapView - Map view
        params - Hit test parameters
        controls - Hit test controls mapped by layer
        Returns:
        Set of map items that were hit

      • deepHitTest

                           int ypos,
                           GeoPoint point,
                           MapView view)
        Description copied from interface: DeepMapItemQuery
        Perform a hit-test for map items
        Specified by:
        deepHitTest in interface DeepMapItemQuery
        Parameters:
        xpos - X-position
        ypos - Y-position
        point - Ppoint on the map that was touched
        view - Map view
        Returns:
        Map item that was hit or null if none hit
